description: Run Puppet apply on a manifest present on a node

manifest.description: Specify the path of the manifest to apply

git_source.description: Specify an optional source of your manifests based on a remote git repo

zip_source.description: Specify an optional source of your manifests based on a remote zip archive url

tgz_source.description: Specify an optional source of your manifests based on a remote tgz archive url

puppet_source.description: Specify an optional source of your manifests based on a Puppet source to be applied via a file resource

puppet_source_tgz.description: Specify an optional source of your manifests based on a tarball retrived via Puppet source and expanded in description

destination.description: Specify the destination dir where to clone the git_source or extract the zip_source and tgz_source

tags.description: Specify a comma separated list of tags to apply

verbose.description: Enable verbose mode in Puppet apply run

debug.description: Enable debug mode in Puppet apply run

no_noop.description: Run puppet apply in no-noop mode

noop.description: Run puppet apply in noop mode
